,MTRI_FRNS_YN as MTRI_FRNS_YN/* */ ,to_char(MTRI_FRNS_DT, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') as MTRI_FRNS_DT /* */ ,MTRI_FRPR_ID as MTRI_FRPR_ID /* */ ,ER_FRNS_RQST_YN as ER_FRNS_RQST_YN /* */ ,IMLN_ORDR_YN as IMLN_ORDR_YN /* */ ,SSPC_SCIN_NM as SSPC_SCIN_NM /* */ ,ORDR_CRTN_DVSN_CD as ORDR_CRTN_DVSN_CD /* */ ,ORDR_CRTN_LNKN_NO as ORDR_CRTN_LNKN_NO /* */ ,FRST_RGSR_ID as FRST_RGSR_ID /* */ ,FRST_RGST_IP as FRST_RGST_IP /* */ ,FRST_RGST_DT as FRST_RGST_DT /* */ ,FRST_RGST_CLNT_PRGM_ID as FRST_RGST_CLNT_PRGM_ID/* */ ,FRST_RGST_SRVR_PRGM_ID as FRST_RGST_SRVR_PRGM_ID /* */ ,LAST_UPDR_ID as LAST_UPDR_ID/* */ ,LAST_UPDT_IP as LAST_UPDT_IP/* */ ,LAST_UPDT_DT as LAST_UPDT_DT/* */ ,LAST_UPDT_CLNT_PRGM_ID as LAST_UPDT_CLNT_PRGM_ID /* */ ,LAST_UPDT_SRVR_PRGM_ID as LAST_UPDT_SRVR_PRGM_ID /* */ ,to_char(ORDR_UPDT_DT, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') as ORDR_UPDT_DT/* */ ,ORDR_UPDR_ID as ORDR_UPDR_ID/* */ ,HGRS_PTRT_RESN_CD as HGRS_PTRT_RESN_CD /* */ ,HGRS_PTRT_YN as HGRS_PTRT_YN/* */ ,MLTI_FETL_CNT as MLTI_FETL_CNT/* */ ,DOPP_EXMN_YN as DOPP_EXMN_YN/* */ ,INPY_ORRE_CTN as INPY_ORRE_CTN/* */ ,OROC_DPRT_CD as OROC_DPRT_CD/* */ FROM MDTRTORDT WHERE PTNO = #{ptno} AND ORDR_YMD = to_date(#{ordrYmd}, 'YYYYMMDD') AND ORDR_CD = #{ordrCd} AND CODV_CD = #{codvCd} AND DC_DVSN_CD <> 'X'
mapper.insert:
/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-sup-su-sup-dao-SupOrdrMngmDAO-insertGndiOrdrDiet */
merge into SUORDRDTT /* 일반식식사처방 */ using DUAL on ( PTNO = #{ptno} /* 환자번호 */ and ORDR_YMD = to_date(#{ordrYmd}, 'YYYYMMDD') /* 처방일자 */ and ORDR_SNO = #{ordrSno} /* 처방일련번호 */ ) when matched then update set GNDI_RESN_CD = #{gndiResnCd} /* 일반식사유코드 */ , GNDI_RESN_CTN = #{gndiResnCtn} /* 일반식사유내용 */ , LAST_UPDR_ID = #{gvUserId} , LAST_UPDT_IP = #{gvUserIp} , LAST_UPDT_DT = sysdate , LAST_UPDT_CLNT_PRGM_ID = #{gvClntPrgmId} , LAST_UPDT_SRVR_PRGM_ID = #{gvSrvrPrgmId} where PTNO = #{ptno} /* 환자번호 */ and ORDR_YMD = to_date(#{ordrYmd}, 'YYYYMMDD') /* 처방일자 */ and ORDR_SNO = #{ordrSno} /* 처방일련번호 */ when not matched then insert ( PTNO /* 환자번호 */ , ORDR_YMD /* 처방일자 */ , ORDR_SNO /* 처방일련번호 */ , GNDI_RESN_CD /* 일반식사유코드 */ , GNDI_RESN_CTN /* 일반식사유내용 */ , FRST_RGSR_ID , FRST_RGST_IP , FRST_RGST_DT , FRST_RGST_CLNT_PRGM_ID , FRST_RGST_SRVR_PRGM_ID , LAST_UPDR_ID , LAST_UPDT_IP , LAST_UPDT_DT , LAST_UPDT_CLNT_PRGM_ID , LAST_UPDT_SRVR_PRGM_ID ) values ( #{ptno} /* 환자번호 */ , to_date(#{ordrYmd},'YYYYMMDD') , #{ordrSno} /* 처방일련번호 */ , #{gndiResnCd} /* 일반식사유코드 */ , #{gndiResnCtn} /* 일반식사유내용 */ , #{gvUserId} , #{gvUserIp} , sysdate , #{gvClntPrgmId} , #{gvSrvrPrgmId} , #{gvUserId} , #{gvUserIp} , sysdate , #{gvClntPrgmId} , #{gvSrvrPrgmId} )
mapper.update:
/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-sup-su-sup-dao-SupOrdrMngmDAO-updateGndiOrdrDiet */
update SUORDRDTT /* 일반식식사처방 */ set PTNO = #{ptno} /* 환자번호 */ , ORDR_YMD = to_date(#{ordrYmd}, 'YYYYMMDD')/* 처방일자 */ , ORDR_SNO = #{ordrSno} /* 처방일련번호 */ , LAST_UPDR_ID = #{gvUserId} , LAST_UPDT_IP = #{gvUserIp} , LAST_UPDT_DT = sysdate , LAST_UPDT_CLNT_PRGM_ID = #{gvClntPrgmId} , LAST_UPDT_SRVR_PRGM_ID = #{gvSrvrPrgmId} where PTNO = #{ptno} /* 환자번호 */ and ORDR_YMD = to_date(#{ordrYmd}, 'YYYYMMDD') /* 처방일자 */ and ORDR_SNO = #{orglOrdrSno} /* 처방일련번호 */
